searchingView.description: Type of record inside the result list. 1 for Bibliographic records, -1 for authority

from.description: Specifies an offset into a query’s result set to begin displaying results from this offset

to.description: Pagination properties. Specifies the end of offset into a query’s result set to stop displaying results

recordView.description: record type. 1 for Bibliographic records, -1 for authority

countDoc.description: count of bibliographic records associated to the current record

queryForAssociatedDoc.description: query to retrieve records associated to the current one

tagHighlighted.description: list of tag in which query terms are present

metadata.description: Metadata about creation and changes to marc record, provided by the server (client should not provide)
